item.title: About Me
item.description: Senior @ Purdue University Major: Computer Science w/ Concentration In Machine Intelligence Minor: Entrepreneurship & Innovation Labs: AI Maritime Manuever Challenge Clubs: Machine Learning @ Purdue, Previously Sigbots Papers: Pac-Man Pete, Purdue AIMM ICC Technical Report Career Data Analyst @ BDO Digital June 2023 - Current Helping clients integrate artificial intelligence into their business. Project Categories Include: Computer Vision Large Language Models Robotics Manufacturing Automation Data warehousing & integration Projects Celerity: Solana Blockchain Trading Bot Artificial Intelligence Maritime Manuever Inter-collegiate Challenge (AIMM ICC) Courses ROS2 Developer Course (ongoing) Microsoft AI-102T: Designing and Implementing a Microsoft Azure AI Solution (working towards certification) Data Analysis With Pandas & Python SQL Zero-To-Hero Purdue CS Courses: Object-Oriented Programming Foundations of CS Programming in C Computer Architecture Data Structures & Algorithms Systems Programming Intro to AI Data Mining & Learning Planned For Senior Year: Analysis Of Algorithms Web Information Search & Management Intro to Robotics
